question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. motorcycle
B. man sitting on the bench
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The man sitting on the bench is positioned further back in the scene, behind the motorcycle and partially obscured by a tree, indicating greater distance from the camera.
